scripts.gitpod-prepare: (yes | sudo apt install screen); (yes | sudo apt install rsync); (yes | sudo apt install net-tools); screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.package:build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:unbuild: rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts) && (cd ./benchmarks && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts) && (cd ./tests && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build; npm publish --access public; npm run package:unbuild
scripts.test: export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; DEBUG='materialized-path:*' jest
scripts.migrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate up --compiler='ts:@deep-foundation/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.unmigrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate down --compiler='ts:@deep-foundation/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.clear: (killall screen; rm -rf .migrate; cd node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura/local/; docker-compose down; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q))
scripts.benchmark: export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; DEBUG='materialized-path:*' ts-node benchmarks/index.ts
